title: The Ledger of Shadows
outcome: Technologists extract forgotten logs written by Halden, exposing years of hidden BCI interventions that changed citizens' lives in secret. Public outrage and council infighting follow, pushing Stenograd toward a reckoning with its past abuses and fueling new calls for total BCI dismantlement.

events.description: Free zone technologists uncover audio annotations by Halden in old BCI maintenance logs, revealing secret interventions in citizens' lives during BCI’s pilot phase.
Documents are leaked citywide, naming families quietly relocated or separated by BCI. Massive public outcry erupts as people demand the Council explain these abuses.
The Council enters emergency session. Innovators call for total transparency, while the Directorate demands suppression of the leaks and a return to hardline control.
Street gatherings turn into truth tribunals as victims of past interventions tell their stories; petitions circulate demanding the BCI be dismantled.
Under mounting pressure, Council factions publicly debate the fate of BCI. Citizens openly question the legitimacy of algorithmic governance, deepening the city’s rift.
